entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 increasing to 70 gusting to 100 near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 100 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 this evening then west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 4.
